effect.en: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to Jolteon during your opponent’s next turn.
effect.fr: Lancez une pièce. Si c’est face, évitez tous les effets d’attaques (y compris les dégâts) infligés à Voltali pendant le prochain tour de votre adversaire.

description.en: It concentrates the weak electric charges emitted by its cells and launches wicked lightning bolts.
